skills.title: Skill set
skills.text: I have gained experience in building projects with a variety of frontend technologies and concepts. With a strong growth mindset, I’m always exploring new areas to enhance my skill set.

about-me.title: WHO`S MICHAEL?
about-me.text: Hi there! I'm Michael, a frontend developer passionate about creating intuitive and efficient digital experiences. With a natural problem-solving mindset and a keen eye for detail, I specialize in transforming complex concepts into visually appealing and functional web solutions.Let’s collaborate and build something remarkable together!

project.headline: Projects
project.text-all: Take a look at some of my projects and see my front-end skills in action. Each project highlights my approach to building responsive, user-friendly designs with efficient code.
project.text-join: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
project.text-debugger: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Michael to find coins and Sprays to fight against the Bugs.
project.text-pokedex: This App is a Slack Clone App. It revolutionizes team communication and collaboration with its intuitive interface, real-time messaging, and robust channel organization.

debugger.description: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Michael to find coins and sprays to fight against the crazy bugs.
debugger.implementationDetails: Short text that describes your role or the workflow for this specific project. Let a recruiter know more about your knowledge and ability to work independently or collaboratively in a structured way.

thoughts.headline: Colleagues' Thoughts
thoughts.cardOneText: Michael really kept the team together with his great organization and clear communication. We wouldn't have got this far without his commitment.
thoughts.cardTwoText: It was a great pleasure to work with Michael. He knows how to push and encourage team members to present the best work possible, always adding something to brainstorm.
thoughts.cardThreeText: Michael was a top team colleague at DA. His positive commitment and willingness to take on responsibility made a significant contribution to us achieving our goals

contact.headline: Ready to work together?
contact.contactText: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work. Feel free to get in touch with your project details. I'd love the opportunity to help create a website that meets your needs!
contact.name: What`s your name?
contact.privacyPolicy: I've read the and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
